PathOfBuilding.Notes:
LEVELING GUIDE:^7^7^7
^xAF6025^xD02090^x70FF70\\AC^x70FF70^x70FF70T^7^x70FF701:^7^7^xD02090
^xD02090- Leveling using Rolling Magma + Combustion + Arcane Surge - Equip Flamewall to assist Rolling Magma - Equip Clarity - Equip Vitality - Equip Flame Dash
^x70FF70\\ACT 2:^7
^xD02090- Equip Wave of Conviction (Level 12) + Combustion + Cruelty or Unbound Ailments - Equip Herald of Ash
^x70FF70\\ACT 3:^7 ^xD02090- Complete 'The Library' Quest to gain access to Determination - Equip Flammability Curse - Equip Molten Shell
^x70FF70\\ACT 4:^7^7 ^xD02090- Once you have completed the Eternal Labrynth, Ascend to the Elementalist and take 'Shaper of Flames'
^x70FF70\\ACT 5:^7 ^xD02090- Just keep leveling and continue to max out resistances + HP + Armour and upgrade your gear ^xD02090 ^x70FF70\\ACT 6:^7 ^xD02090- Just keep leveling and continue to max out resistances + HP + Armour and upgrade your gear - You should be able to ascend again by the end of the Act; take Shaper of Storms
^x70FF70\\ACT 7:^7 ^xD02090- Ascend again and pick up Mastermind of Discord
^x70FF70\\ACT 8:^7^7 ^xD02090- Just keep leveling and continue to max out resistances + HP + Armour and upgrade your gear - Ascend again and pick up Mastermind of Discord
^x70FF70\\ACT 9:^7 ^xD02090- No adjustments, just keep leveling; look for better gear as you go and keep upgrading making sure to keep your resistances capped at all times - If you are not level 65 by the end of Act 9; farm Blood Aquaduct until you reach lvl 65 as you will be under level for Act 10 and you will have some issues in the last act of the game before you reach mapping where you to progress gear much more easily with mapping drops and currency^7
^x70FF70\\ACT 10:^7 ^xD02090- Focus on maxing out resistances at this stage - Progress through the Act10 - T3 mapping tree
^xD02090^xD02090^xD02090^x70FF70Final Acendencey one you obtain an offering of the goddess from maps:^7^7 ^xD02090Heart of Destruction
^x70FF70\\Beyond T3 Mapping:^7 ^xD02090- refer to the mid and endgame trees and build towards this; this will be a gradual process^7 ^xD02090however this build will work as it was heavily tested last league and you will notice the power creep as you go.^7 ^xD02090- Farm for the below uniques below - Aim to switch to CI once you complete the compaign (if need be self crafting some good chest, gloves, boots will give you high levels of ES/Life until you can get Incandescent Heart - use dense fossils from Delve)^7 ^xD02090- You can start also considering switching to D/D Blackflame from this point also^7
^xFFFF77Sources of Power Spikes in early/mid tier mapping once gear bceomes available:^7 + Aegis Aurura Shield - Huge Defense Increase (more expensive and you may need to run a high armour shield for a little while to compensate for this) + Viridi's Viel (common drop from maven, will be cheap and avaliable within the first day of league) + Incandescent Heart - Huge defense increase for early mapping if you target a 5 link early (this is a pretty cheap item) + The Eternal Struggle - Cheap and drops during map leveling - you want a roll that gives you to cull effect + Cinder Swallow Flash + Forbidden Flame and Flesh are the last thing to focus on + Despair rings can be obtained in either delve or self craft from level 80+ Hunter Rings (alteration spamming) + Watcher's Eye - this is very accessible Watcher's Eye
^xAF6025^xFFFF77^7

Gem.nameSpec: Vaal Detonate Dead of Chain Reaction
